entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 4:32 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then rain. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low plus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
